name: Sitashma!
greetingText: I'm so lucky to meet the most beautiful Girl, In the most beautiful Years.
wishText: The red face looks like a blooming, with flowers on your head. May you stay young forever and Be Happy for every Single Day, Lot's of LoveðŸ©·
textInChatBox: I wish you a very sincere Happy Birthday!! lots of Love blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are very very very Special
outroText: I hope you like this little Surprise!
replayText: If you like it, You can watch it again! Or maybe...
